REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2604 reute r f BC-BRISTOL-MYERS-CO-<BMY 06-02 0052

TEXT.TITLE: BRISTOL-MYERS CO <BMY> DECLARES DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Bristol-Myers Co said it declared a dividend of 35 cts a share on its common, reflecting the two-for-one stock split approved at the May five annual meeting of the company. The dividend is payable August one to shareholders of record July three. Reuter
